Name: TPie+
Author: k8thekat
Description: Fork of TPie -- Highly configurable hotbars that can be toggled with a keybind. They can be filled with Actions, Items, Gear Sets, Macros and more...
Changelog:
# v2.1.0.1

- Documentation Update
- Further backend setting changes and naming conventions to match `TPie+`.
- Attempted fix for Dalamud Icon urls.
